scenarios.name: Supply Chain Disruption Impact
scenarios.description: Find customer orders at risk due to natural disaster affecting component suppliers. Requires: Event→AFFECTS_LOCATION→Location→LOCATED_IN→Vendor→SUPPLIES→Material→COMPOSED_OF→Product→ORDERS
scenarios.query: Which customer orders will be delayed due to the Taiwan typhoon affecting our component suppliers

scenarios.name: Budget Contagion via Shared Vendors
scenarios.description: Find departments at financial risk due to shared vendor dependencies with overrun departments. Requires: Dept[overrun]→HAS_COST_CENTER→CC→PAYS→Vendor→SUPPLIES→Material→USED_IN→Project→FUNDED_BY→Dept2
scenarios.query: Which departments share vendors with the Engineering department that has budget overruns

scenarios.name: Critical Component Single Sourcing Risk
scenarios.description: Find products with components that have only one supplier (single point of failure). Requires: Product→COMPOSED_OF→Material→SUPPLIED_BY→Vendor with cardinality check
scenarios.query: Which products have critical components sourced from only one vendor creating supply chain vulnerability

scenarios.name: Project Overrun Root Cause Analysis
scenarios.description: Find external factors (events, vendor issues) contributing to project budget overruns. Requires: Project[OVERRUN]←USED_IN←Material→SUPPLIED_BY→Vendor→LOCATED_IN→Location←AFFECTS←Event
scenarios.query: What external events or vendor issues are causing the Holiday Laptop project to run over budget

scenarios.name: Cross-Department Invoice Anomaly Detection
scenarios.description: Find invoices paid to vendors not in the department's approved vendor list. Requires: Invoice→PAID_TO→Vendor comparison with Department→HAS_BUDGET→Budget[approved_vendors]
scenarios.query: Which invoices were paid to vendors outside the department's pre-approved supplier list
